properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 11:02PM EST until February 9 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Raleigh NC
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North
Carolina...

Rocky River Near Norwood affecting Anson and Stanly Counties
Tar River At Louisburg affecting Franklin County
Tar River At Tarboro affecting Edgecombe County
Tar River At Rocky Mount affecting Edgecombe County

The Flood Warning continues for the Tar River At Rocky Mount.
* until Sunday evening, or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 10:15 PM Friday the stage was 20.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 21.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* The river will rise above flood stage by after midnight
tomorrow and continue to rise to near 21.8 feet by tomorrow early
afternoon.The river will fall below flood stage by late Sunday morning.
* At 23.0 feet, Several streets west of business US301 are
flooded, including E Ridge Street and Melton Drive.
* At 21.0 feet, Flood stage. Flooding reaches Melton Drive
and E Ridge Street.
properties.instruction:
Safety message. If you encounter deep water while driving, do not
attempt to drive through. Turn around, dont drown.
